text: Ceroplesis fasciata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1913 and is known from the Democratic Republic of the Congo.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis fasciata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Ceroplesis Category:Beetles described in 1913
title: Ceroplesis fasciata
